title: The Honorable Dexter A. Johnson
abstract:
April 13, 2008
The Honorable Dexter A. Johnson
Legislative Counsel of the State of Oregon
Legislative Counsel Committee
The State of Oregon
Attn: Mr. Sean Brennan, Esq.
Re: Notice of copyright infringement and demand to cease and desist
Dear Mr. Johnson:
Tim Stanley of Justia Inc. shared with me your April 7, 2008 “take down” notice 
requiring him to remove all copies of Oregon Revised Statutes from the Internet and 
claiming that these state statutes are state secrets requiring your permission
